Rancher Helm Exporter
  • API Reference
  • View page source

API Reference

Command line interface for exporting Kubernetes resources to a Helm chart.

class rancher_helm_exporter.cli.ChartExporter(args: Namespace)

Export Kubernetes API resources and render them into a Helm chart structure.

run() → None

Execute the export pipeline.

class rancher_helm_exporter.cli.ExportResult(kind: str, name: str, path: Path)

Summary details for an exported Kubernetes resource.

Main exporter class that orchestrates the export process.

class rancher_helm_exporter.exporter.ExportOrchestrator(global_config: GlobalConfig | None = None)

High-level orchestrator for export operations.

export_from_config(export_config: ExportConfig) → ExportResult

Run export operation from configuration.

Parameters:

export_config – Export configuration

Returns:

Export result

export_interactive(base_config: ExportConfig) → ExportResult

Run interactive export with resource selection.

Parameters:

base_config – Base configuration for the export

Returns:

Export result

class rancher_helm_exporter.exporter.HelmChartExporter(export_config: ExportConfig, global_config: GlobalConfig | None = None)

Main exporter class that orchestrates the Helm chart generation process.

ensure_required_binaries() → None

Ensure required binaries are available - for compatibility.

export() → ExportResult

Execute the complete export process.

Returns:

Export result with statistics and output path

Raises:

ExportError – If export fails

list_resource_items(resource_type: str) → List[Dict[str, Any]]

List resources of a given type - for compatibility with interactive mode.

Parameters:

resource_type – Type of resource to list

Returns:

List of resources

Helm chart generation utilities.

class rancher_helm_exporter.chart_generator.ChartGenerator(release_name: str, chart_version: str = '0.1.0', app_version: str = '1.0.0')

Generates Helm chart structure and files.

create_chart_structure(output_path: str, force: bool = False) → Path

Create the basic Helm chart directory structure.

Parameters:

  • output_path – Path where the chart should be created

  • force – Whether to overwrite existing directory

Returns:

Path to the created chart directory

Raises:

ChartGenerationError – If chart creation fails

lint_chart(chart_path: Path) → bool

Run helm lint on the generated chart.

Parameters:

chart_path – Path to the chart directory

Returns:

True if lint passes, False otherwise

write_manifest(manifest: Dict[str, Any], output_path: str, prefix: str = '') → ExportResult

Write a Kubernetes manifest to a Helm template file.

Parameters:

  • manifest – Kubernetes manifest to write

  • output_path – Base output directory path

  • prefix – Optional prefix for the filename

Returns:

ExportResult with details about the written file

Raises:

ChartGenerationError – If writing fails

write_summary(export_results: List[ExportResult], chart_path: Path) → None

Write an export summary file.

Parameters:

  • export_results – List of exported resources

  • chart_path – Path to the chart directory

class rancher_helm_exporter.chart_generator.TemplateProcessor

Processes manifests to add Helm templating.

add_basic_templating(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any]

Add basic Helm templating to a manifest.

Parameters:

manifest – Original manifest

Returns:

Manifest with basic templating added

parameterize_common_values(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any]

Parameterize common values that should be configurable.

Parameters:

manifest – Original manifest

Returns:

Manifest with parameterized values

Utility functions for manifest traversal and resource handling.

class rancher_helm_exporter.utils.ManifestTraverser

Utility for traversing Kubernetes manifest structures.

static get_completions(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → int | None

Extract completions from a Job manifest.

static get_containers(pod_spec: Dict[str, Any]) → Iterator[Dict[str, Any]]

Iterate over all containers in a pod spec.

static get_manifest_name(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → str

Extract name from manifest metadata.

static get_manifest_namespace(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → str | None

Extract namespace from manifest metadata.

static get_metadata(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any]

Extract metadata from a manifest.

static get_pod_labels(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, str]

Extract labels from pod template metadata.

static get_pod_spec(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any]

Extract pod spec from various workload types.

static get_replica_count(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → int

Extract replica count from a workload manifest.

static get_schedule(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → str | None

Extract schedule from a CronJob manifest.

static get_spec(manifest: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any]

Extract spec from a manifest.

class rancher_helm_exporter.utils.ResourceReferenceExtractor

Extract references to other resources from manifests.

static extract_configmap_references(manifests: List[Dict[str, Any]]) → Set[str]

Extract all ConfigMap references from a list of manifests.

static extract_pvc_references(manifests: List[Dict[str, Any]]) → Set[str]

Extract PersistentVolumeClaim references from manifests.

static extract_secret_references(manifests: List[Dict[str, Any]]) → Set[str]

Extract all Secret references from a list of manifests.

static extract_service_account_references(manifests: List[Dict[str, Any]]) → Set[str]

Extract ServiceAccount references from manifests.

static find_ingresses_for_services(ingresses: List[Dict[str, Any]], service_names: Set[str]) → Set[str]

Find ingresses that reference the given services.

static find_matching_services(workloads: List[Dict[str, Any]], services: List[Dict[str, Any]]) → Set[str]

Find services that match workload selectors.

class rancher_helm_exporter.utils.RetryUtils

Utility functions for retry logic.

static exponential_backoff(attempt: int, base: float = 2.0, max_delay: float = 60.0) → float

Calculate exponential backoff delay.

static retry_with_backoff(func, max_retries: int = 3, backoff_base: float = 2.0, exceptions: tuple = (<class 'Exception'>, ))

Decorator for retrying functions with exponential backoff.

class rancher_helm_exporter.utils.StringUtils

String utility functions.

static slugify(value: str) → str

Convert a string to a filesystem-safe slug.

static truncate(text: str, width: int) → str

Truncate text to fit within a given width.

rancher_helm_exporter.utils.slugify(value: str) → str

Convert a string to a filesystem-safe slug.
